channel.title: 718/742 item stats help
channel.description:
I have a major problem. So basically I want to make the dominion sword a 1 handed weapon, so that you can put a defender and/or shield on another hand...
How do I do that? It has the right attack animations for a longsword, but I always wanted to know how to solve this problem. I wield the defender, but when i wield the dominion sword, the defender unwields. Any help? Where do I change the code and what code to change???

item.title: 718/742 item stats help
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

There’s no code.
You need a cache editor.

Read full topic
